author: djrtwo
content:
Reminder, we are attempting to revisting 3/6 blob discussion on tomorrow's call. That said, we've had less devnet experience than we expected by this time so understood it might be a "still would like to observe more". Still, if you've had a chance to look at mainnet data and/or consult internal networking resources, please bring your perspective tomorrow

https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/821
